      • addEmbargo

        public void addEmbargo​(String userId,
                       String subjectId,
                       String[] forcedEmbargoGroups)
                throws RepositoryException
        Description copied from interface: EmbargoWorkflow
        Adds the embargo to the current document. The user ID used to fetch the group of the user and mark the document so that it will only be available for users in the same group.
        Specified by:
        addEmbargo in interface EmbargoWorkflow
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the user.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException
        org.hippoecm.repository.api.MappingException
